flow.descriptionCdata:
78cc338d-c9a3-48fc-a5f4-f563442845c1.10dfa003-dcbe-4c80-9efd-d4e517e411da.prompt=User Identifier 78cc338d-c9a3-48fc-a5f4-f563442845c1.8540bc0b-c845-4b3f-9743-3824bde79e80.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz 78cc338d-c9a3-48fc-a5f4-f563442845c1.9a114806-832b-4710-b63e-94d4cba9876d.description=
This operation does not do anything. It can be used to filter flow variables by defining them as inputs and filtering them in the Results tab.

Inputs\:
    field1 – An optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
    field2 – An optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
    field3 – An optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.
    field4 – An optional input that can be used for filtering flow variables.

Results\:
    returnResult - This is the primary output. It contains the value of  "field1" as it was specified at input or when filtered. 

Responses\:
    success - The operation completed as stated in the description.
78cc338d-c9a3-48fc-a5f4-f563442845c1.b14ae729-b9ac-4108-8c68-5110f6be8b7f.prompt=Component ID 78cc338d-c9a3-48fc-a5f4-f563442845c1.f7c7cbed-b3d5-4d30-838e-b3162d1e2860.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz 78cc338d-c9a3-48fc-a5f4-f563442845c1.fae67e68-3b3f-4112-af29-be2e5dd44d21.description=generates a random password consisting og lowercase letters, uppercase letter and number Inputs\: passwordLength - specifies length of the password to be generated Outputs\: generatedPassword - the generated password string
flow.name: Add Admin User Linux
